author: Courtney Kube
description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has told his staff to identify any members of the military mocking or condoning the assassination of the conservative activist.
title: Pete Hegseth tells Pentagon staff to hunt for negative Charlie Kirk posts by service members

author: Natasha Korecki
description: At a news conference in the days after the assassination of Charlie Kirk in Utah, Gov.
title: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox steps into a national healing role after Charlie Kirk assassination

author: David Ingram
description: A stew of hyper-toxic rhetoric has surged through social media and American discourse after the killing of conservative activist Charlie Kirk.
title: Toxic rhetoric, including calls for 'civil war' and retribution, surges after Charlie Kirk killing

author: Ellie J. Rudy
description: Butch cowboys, queer cyberpunks, transmasculine heartthrobs and global politics were center stage at the Brooklyn Museum on Thursday for DapperQ’s 10th annual queer fashion show.
title: Cowboys, cyberpunks and politics dominate at NYC queer fashion show

description: An officer fatally shot a person who injured an ICE agent during an immigration arrest, federal officials said. Officers were conducting a stop near Chicago when the person resisted and attempted to drive his vehicle into the officers attempting to arrest him, subsequently striking and dragging one of them, ICE said in a statement.
title: Person killed and agent injured at ICE arrest

description: Emoji innuendo threatens Maryland statues
title: Emoji innuendo threatens Maryland statues

description: Following the shooting death of conservative activist Charlie Kirk, NBC News' Brian Cheung and Ryan Nobles talk about political violence concerns. Listen to "Here's the Scoop" wherever you get your podcasts.
title: Here's the Scoop: Concerns about political violence

description: Humpty Dumpty mini golf statue toppled in New Jersey
title: Humpty Dumpty mini golf statue toppled in New Jersey

author: Emily Lorsch
description: The days of plain, predictable school lunches are fading in some districts.
title: Schools spice up lunch as students ask for more global foods

description: Australia approves first chlamydia vaccine for koalas
title: Australia approves first chlamydia vaccine for koalas

description: Several colleges and universities reported threats in the United States. Although some of the threats have turned out to be hoaxes, NBC News' Ryan Nobles has a look at the recent tension on campuses, including that of Utah Valley University, where Charlie Kirk was shot and killed.
title: Threats made to several U.S. colleges and universities

author: Ben Kamisar
description: Missouri’s state Legislature has passed a plan to redraw the state’s congressional map and turn Democratic Rep.
title: Missouri Legislature passes new Republican-drawn congressional map

title: Mitchell & Ness restocks Princess Diana Eagles jacket

author: Nicole Acevedo
description: A spokesperson for Immigration and Customs Enforcement said officers were conducting a vehicle stop as part of their "targeted law enforcement activity" on Friday morning.
title: A person is killed and an ICE agent injured in an immigration arrest near Chicago

description: Pokémon cards bring in cash for savvy investors
title: Pokémon cards bring in cash for savvy investors

author: Berkeley Lovelace Jr.
description: FDA officials plan to present data they claim links the Covid vaccine to 25 deaths in children at a CDC vaccine panel meeting next week, a source confirmed to NBC News.
title: FDA to present data it claims ties Covid shots to child deaths at CDC meeting

description: NBC News legal analyst Misty Marris explains what comes next now the suspect in the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk is in custody.
title: What next now Charlie Kirk shooting suspect in custody?

description: Utah Governor Spencer Cox says, "Young people loved Charlie and young people hated Charlie," before sharing quotes from conservative activist Charlie Kirk, who was shot at a political event in Utah.
title: Utah governor shares quotes from Charlie Kirk

description: Investigators released the mugshot of Tyler Robinson, the 22-year-old suspect in Charlie Kirk’s assassination. Officials say family members helped turn Robinson in.
title: Mugshot released of Charlie Kirk shooting suspect

description: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox urges people to log off social media and "touch grass" in the wake of the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk and graphic imagery appearing on social media.
title: Utah governor tells people to 'touch grass'

description: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox says the assassination of Charlie Kirk is an “attack on the American experiment.”
title: Kirk shooting is attack on 'American experiment’

description: The office of Utah Gov. John Spencer released the mug shot of the suspected shooter who allegedly killed conservative activist Charlie Kirk.
title: Officials Release Mug Shot of Alleged Charlie Kirk Killer

description: Officials in Utah say messages were found inscribed on bullet casings found near the rifle they believe was used to shoot and killed Charlie Kirk at Utah Valley University.
title: Messages inscribed on casings in Charlie Kirk shooting

description: Family member of Charlie Kirk shooting suspect told police that he became "more political" in recent years, Utah governor says.
title: Family of Kirk shooting suspect says he got 'more political'

description: Utah Governor Spencer Cox offered details on the capture and investigation into 22-year-old Tyler Robinson, the man suspected in the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk. He also went into Robinson’s background and history.
title: ‘We got him’: Utah governor confirms arrest of Kirk shooting suspect

description: President Trump announces that law enforcement has the suspect in the assassination of Charlie Kirk in custody during an appearance on Fox News.
title: Trump says Kirk suspect is in custody on Fox News

author: Rebecca Shabad
description: President Donald Trump said Friday that he's planning to send federal law enforcement and the National Guard into Memphis, Tennessee, to lower crime in the city following his surge into Washington, D.C., over the last month.
title: Trump says he's sending the National Guard into Memphis to 'fix' crime like D.C.

description: The family of the person believed to be the suspect in the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk identified him and called police, authorities said.
title: Charlie Kirk shooting alleged suspect's family called police

description: President Trump says the suspect in Charlie Kirk's shooting is in custody.
title: Trump says Charlie Kirk shooting suspect is in custody

description: A string of violent false threats is putting universities around the United States on edge, including at the U.S. Naval Academy in Maryland and at least six HBCUs. NBC’s Ryan Nobles reports for TODAY.
title: Charlie Kirk Assassination Sparks String of Hoax Threats

description: NBC’s Tom Winter joins TODAY to discuss the latest developments into the investigation of Charlie Kirk’s assassination and the new photos and videos of the alleged shooter distributed by officials. “The one thing that is clear this morning is they’re relying on the public’s help,” he says.
title: Officials ‘Relying on the Public’s Help’ to Find Charlie Kirk’s Killer

description: Former President Joe Biden is running into a problem in his nascent effort to raise money for a presidential library: Donors are checked out.“I want an $800,000 refund,” said John Morgan, a Florida-based personal injury lawyer.
